repeated_behaviors.description: The subject rapidly scratches their head with their right hand for approximately 5 seconds.
The subject quickly glances around the room in a seemingly nervous manner, avoiding direct eye contact with the camera.
The subject begins tapping their right foot on the floor rhythmically. This behavior continues intermittently for the next 2 minutes.
The subject brings their left hand to their mouth and begins biting their nails. This behavior lasts for approximately 10 seconds.
The subject interlaces their fingers and twists them together repeatedly, demonstrating restlessness.
The subject clears their throat loudly several times in quick succession.
